claim: Ezra Edelman directed O.J.: Made in America.
premise_source_doc_sentence: He won the Academy Award for Best Documentary Feature for directing O.J. : Made in America  (  2016  )  .

claim: Ezra Edelman directed O.J.: Made in America.
premise_source_doc_sentence: O.J. : Made in America is a 2016 American documentary produced and directed by Ezra Edelman for ESPN Films and their 30 for 30 series , which was released as a five-part miniseries and in theatrical format .

claim: Ezra Edelman directed O.J.: Made in America.
premise_source_doc_sentence: O.J. : Made in America premiered at the Sundance Film Festival on January 22 , 2016 , was released in theaters in New York City and Los Angeles in May 2016 and debuted on ABC on June 11 , 2016 , and aired on ESPN .
